segments.text: I see the water suddenly overflowing from the sink; it's unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her plate, she hasn't noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€”that's got to be cold!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning to the kids, wow, the boy's really up there on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is leaning back; I didn't expect it to be that unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got cookies in hand, and his sister is reaching eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full; they must have planned this sneak.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight through the window makes the garden pop into view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, contrasting the chaos starting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are tied back, letting in all that light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware she is of everything behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels like it's about to change in a second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple kitchen could hold so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR
